scripts.build:vocablist: node packages/data-processing/scripts/generate-vocablist.js --sourceDir web/public/data/vocabs --output web/public/data/vocablist-source-catalog.ttl && node packages/data-processing/scripts/process-vocab.js --profiles web/public/data/profiles.ttl --source web/public/data/vocablist-source-catalog.ttl --type catalog --outDir web/public/export/_system/vocabularies --backgroundDir web/public/data/background
scripts.build:ensure-data: if [ ! -d web/public/data/vocabs ] || [ -z "$(ls -A web/public/data/vocabs/*.ttl 2>/dev/null)" ]; then echo 'No vocabs found in web/public/data/, using sample-data'; mkdir -p web/public/data/vocabs web/public/data/background && for f in web/public/sample-data/*.ttl; do case "$f" in */profiles.ttl) ;; *) cp "$f" web/public/data/vocabs/ ;; esac; done && cp web/public/sample-data/profiles.ttl web/public/data/profiles.ttl && cp -r web/public/sample-data/background/ web/public/data/background/; fi
scripts.build:all-export: pnpm build:clean-export && pnpm build:ensure-data && pnpm build:vocabs && pnpm build:vocablist && pnpm build:vocab-metadata && pnpm build:labels && pnpm build:search
scripts.build: pnpm build:all-export && pnpm build:components && pnpm --filter @prez-lite/web generate
